Elkay Manufacturing Company began as a vision of Leopold Katz and his son Louis on the North side of Chicago in 1920. Their goal was to manufacture the highest quality sinks and provide exceptional service. The result: a thriving company built one satisfied customer at a time.

Family owned since 1920, Elkay® has been making innovative, high-quality products and delivering exceptional customer care for almost a century.
